headline: Is VeriSign (VRSN) Pricing Look Stretched After Recent 1-Year Share Gain?
summary: If you are wondering whether VeriSign's share price lines up with its underlying value, starting with a clear look at valuation can help you frame that question. VeriSign's stock last closed at US$248.66, with returns of 3.9% over 7 days, 2.8% over 30 days, 3.4% year to date, and 19.7% over 1 year, as well as 17.3% over 3 years and 28.5% over 5 years. These returns sit against a backdrop of ongoing attention on VeriSign's role in internet infrastructure and its position in the US software...
